Posts.Content: Jan 24, 2018 07:56PM - edited Jan 24, 2018 07:57PM by Eljaywest I was on kadcyla for seven months but then a scan showed my brain mets had grow, though some had shrunk. So my onc took me off kadcyla and I'm now just finished my first week of xeloda. Not a sinke side effect! So far! I'm waiting ,to get on the tykerb. The cost is $4000/month! We have appliedd for assistance. Has anyone had any luck with getting it at least partially paid? Thanks.
